1.dialogue: Yo、Maris。\ How is your life as a child？
1.speaker: same

2.dialogue: Don't Wanna、There is weird guy here…\I wonder what he is saying…？
2.speaker: same

4.dialogue: Ah ? You were talking to me ?
4.speaker: same

5.dialogue: Is there a problem about it？
5.speaker: same

6.dialogue: If there is a problem ？Sure there is！\If you want to talk with me、\You have to follow the proper procedure！
6.speaker: same

7.dialogue: Hey, are you paying me head ！？
7.speaker: same

9.dialogue: Huu, so the succubus is struggling as well。\Say that I've to look after such a miserable devil。
9.speaker: same

10.dialogue: Thank you very much。\I feel like I can bear it with someone who understands。
10.speaker: same

11.dialogue: You guys are saying horrible things…\My heart and body are crying\Even though it's a casual exchange…
11.speaker: same

13.dialogue: アタシの契約者は、\なんだってこんなのと契約したの？
13.speaker: same

14.dialogue: 特に強くもないし、頭もよくない。\一目惚れするほどのイケメンならまだわかるけど、\そういうわけでもないし。
14.speaker: same

15.dialogue: I think It's…運が良かった、と言いますか。
15.speaker: same

16.dialogue: 運ねぇ…ま、あの子が住んでるマンションで\ポスティングのバイトをしてなきゃ\会うこともなかったわね。
16.speaker: same

17.dialogue: 良かったわね、アンタ。\運だけはいいみたいよ。
17.speaker: same

18.dialogue: そうでもないと思います。\宝くじでは、せいぜい300円当たる程度の\運の良さですし。
18.speaker: same

19.dialogue: Isn't it a bad way to say that？\It looks like Maris is worth 300 JPY.\ (JPY = Japanese Yen)
19.speaker: same

20.dialogue: Nah、Rather…This day、御主人様の1年分の\運を使い果たしたのではないでしょうか。
20.speaker: same

21.dialogue: Y..Your joke are bad !\Shall I show you to fear your Master ？
21.speaker: same

22.dialogue: Oh？Does that mean ...？\Nice、come here.\I'll make it clear who is the stronger.
22.speaker: same

23.dialogue: Arg、Drop the guns…！\Do you want to be caught for violation of Firearm and Sword Possession Law…？
23.speaker: same

24.dialogue: Why is it… I just want to stop watching this already…
24.speaker: same

25.dialogue: Ara ？What are you doing Liza？\Can it be、the most fun things in the world、\Watching a fight～？
25.speaker: same

26.dialogue: Ufufufuっ♥I've discovered new things about Liza。\I thought that you dislike something like that♥
26.speaker: same

27.dialogue: A...Actually, I was about to stop them。
27.speaker: same

28.dialogue: 駄目よ？こういうのは独り占めしないで、\みんなに知らせないと♥
28.speaker: same

29.dialogue: …it's a misunderstading。\Nah、少し考え込んではいましたが…
29.speaker: same

30.dialogue: I.. I understand… If you guys are saying this…\OKAY！Maris come here！I'll show you！
30.speaker: same

31.dialogue: Master♥下剋上に付き合うのもいいですけど～\中途半端に構うと、痛い目に遭いますよぉ？
31.speaker: same

32.dialogue: It's not of your buisness！\…seriously、now that all noises are here…\Ahhh、it can't be helped anymore…
32.speaker: same

35.dialogue: What is it, Maris？\Do not hold back, come here。\Ah、give me 3 seconds.I'm still not prepared…
35.speaker: same

36.dialogue: …Uhm, when I think about it、\I do not have any merits\to fight a boring devil like you.
36.speaker: same

38.dialogue: Fuuu… Safe.\I was about to show a miserable figure in front of succubus…
38.speaker: none

40.dialogue: モナ自ら、ボコボコにされたご主人さまを\手当てしてあげようと思ったのに♥\なーんて、ふふ、冗談ですよぉ！
40.speaker: same

42.dialogue: That Mona wasn't bad…\Maybe the strongest of these…？
42.speaker: same
